description: List material sites with filtering and pagination.

flags.name: active-around
flags.validation: ISO 8601 datetime; server requires a single value

flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: broker

flags.description: Filter by activity as of datetime (ISO 8601)
flags.name: has-activity-as-of
flags.validation: ISO 8601 datetime; server requires a single value

flags.name: is-available-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 datetime; server requires a single value

flags.description: Filter by equipment movement only status (true/false)
flags.name: is-only-for-equipment-movement

flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: material-supplier
material-types
flags.validation: IDs must refer to existing material types

flags.description: Filter by parent material site ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: parent

permissions: Material sites are scoped by MaterialSitePolicy. For non-admin users, the scope joins to material suppliers authorized by MaterialSupplierPolicy (policy_scope_for! on MaterialSupplier); admins may see broader scope.
validation_notes: Filters with boolean semantics require strict true/false values (is-ticket-maker, is-broker-active, is-only-for-equipment-movement, material-transaction-integration). active-around, has-activity-as-of, and is-available-at accept a single ISO 8601 datetime value each. address-near expects lat,lng,radius_miles. operating-status must be a valid operating status enum value (active/inactive). material-types filter values must correspond to existing material type IDs.
